metadata.name: Active Directory Structure Export Via Ldifde.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "ldifde.exe" in order to export organizational Active Directory structure.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ldifde.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('ldifde.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-f')) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "ldifde.exe" in order to export organizational Active Directory structure.
